name: Aza (Charles197)
description:
The game is still early in development release date is around April -May 2020, its a simple little Rpg game with manga/comic scenes coming soon. For now the idea is to test the base core mechanics, for now the project is basically free and playable in browser feel free to donate or send join my patrons if you want to fund my life as a creator. If anything is broken let me know i the comments below thank youuuu!

Controls -

ButtonsActionsZ Key or Controller AAttack, InteractX Key or Controller XBlockWASD (W is left, D is right, S is down, W is up) or Left AnalogMovementEsc or StartPauseSpace bar or Controller Right BumperLock OnKey R or Controller Left BumperSwitch Lock On
